list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: break or cause to break suddenly and completely, typically with a sharp cracking sound.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: dây đàn guitar tiếp tục chụp

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of an animal) make a sudden audible bite.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a dog was snapping at his heels
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một con chó đang chụp vào gót chân của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she claims she snapped after years of violence
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy tuyên bố cô ấy đã chụp sau nhiều năm bạo lực.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he planned to spend the time snapping rare wildlife
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ấy đã lên kế hoạch dành thời gian cho động vật hoang dã quý hiếm

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: put (the ball) into play by a quick backward movement from the ground.
a sudden, sharp cracking sound or movement.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she closed her purse with a snap
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô đóng ví bằng một cái snap

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a hurried, irritable tone or manner.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: “I'm still waiting,” he said with a snap
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: "Tôi vẫn đang chờ đợi," anh nói với một snap

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a quick backward movement of the ball from the ground that begins a play.
done or taken on the spur of the moment, unexpectedly, or without notice.
